name: Mr. Heart Loves You Very Much
name_original: Mr. Heart Loves You Very Much
description:
This is an old game I made for the Gamma 256 event during the Montreal International Games Festival, Nov. 2007.  The theme of the show was to make a game as low-res as possible, so I thought about making the 'playable' resolution be chopped into tiny tiles that the player could push around.  This simple puzzle game was the result: Push parts of the level to navigate your character over to the elusive Mr. Heart.

I've since lost the source code, so it is what it is!
